Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav starts a new chapter in his cricketing career as captain of the Indian team in T20Is.
Gautham Gambhir takes over as Head Coach of the World Champions in T20s.
Nuwan Thushara is out of the series due to a finger injury.
Hardik Pandya returns against an opposition he loves.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka vs India: Numbers check
